Articles.Content:
I have a small problem I was wondering if anyone could help me with? In the VAB the thumbnails on the top line in the parts selector are cut in half (se links) and it's driving me nuts. Does anyone know what could be causing this? I have the latest version of the (Steam) game and all DLC's installed.

Link #1

Link #2
Do you force KSP to use opengl? That's usually the culprit of this issue.
OpenGL was indeed the culprit, When I removed it the icons worked just fine. Thank you so much for solving this for me :-)
